content: rippling waves ear warmer stitches materials chain- chain k hook slip_stitch- slip_stitch darning needle blo- back loop only weight 5 yarn- lion brand color made easy or another similar weight yarn half_double_crochet- half_double_crochet size teen/adult- fits 20-25 around 4 5 tall rs- right side gauge 11 half_double_crochet and 7 row = 4 ws- wrong side pattern may not be altered copied redistributed or sold as your own pattern you may sell finished products please give credit to this pattern with a link back to hooked with a twist etsy and ravelry shops tag your hats on instagram using #hookedwithatwist follow hookedwithatwist on instagram and facebook to stay up to date with new products and patterns pattern is worked with blo in all stitches except row 1 © hooked with a twist 2019 chain 16 1 slip_stitch in 2nd chain from hook and next 2 chains half_double_crochet 3 slip_stitch 3 twice chain 1 and turn rs 2 blo from here on out slip_stitch 3 half_double_crochet 3 twice slip_stitch 3 chain 1 and turn ws 3 slip_stitch 6 half_double_crochet 3 slip_stitch 6 chain 1 and turn 4 slip_stitch 6 half_double_crochet 3 slip_stitch 6 chain 1 and turn 5 slip_stitch 3 half_double_crochet 3 twice slip_stitch 3 chain 1 and turn 6 slip_stitch 3 half_double_crochet 3 twice slip_stitch 3 chain 1 and turn 7 slip_stitch 6 half_double_crochet 3 slip_stitch 6 chain 1 and turn 8 slip_stitch 6 half_double_crochet 3 slip_stitch 6 chain 1 and turn repeat row 5-8 thirteen more times for a total of 64 row fold rs together and slip_stitch through foundation chain and blo of last row all 15 st tie off and weave in ends © hooked with a twist 2019
